text.comment:
typedoc-theme-yaf Is a data driven single page application (SPA).
You are hopefully looking at it right now.

This frontend is a zero dependency construct of native Web Components, all being ancestors of TypedocThemeYaf.

Much of the frontend architecture is event driven.

The application state is generally immutable, and persisted across sessions using localstorage.
